column2: my favorite place to go for breakfast/hangover cure in Houston. Whenever friends and family visit
column3: this is where I take them. Yes
column4: parking is nonexistent (you have legs!) and it's quite tiny but I'm not going to Hugo's for an all out brunch buffet with stuffy corp execs who still wear ties on the weekend. I'm coming to Baby Barnaby's because I love the ambiance
